pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Intel(R) Math Kernel Library is a mathematical library mostly optimized for Intel processors (also works on AMDs). It contains BLAS and LAPACK implementations, Fast Fourier Transforms, a vector math library, and random number generators. It also has multiprocessor capacities. The package is installed as binary and has a restrictive license. Please see license terms and home page for proper use.
